item.title: NHS to Offer New Cystic Fibrosis Therapy Alyftrek
item.description: NICE has approved a once-daily cystic fibrosis drug, as NHS England secures wider access for patients. Medscape News UK

item.title: AHA’s ‘Life’s Simple 7’ Show Broad Health Benefits

item.title: Study Finds Link Between IL-6 and Diabetic Eye Disease
item.description: A large, prospective study implicates high levels of interleukin 6 with severity of diabetic retinopathy and shows it may be predictive of disease pro...

item.title: Does Romosozumab Deserve Its Black Box Warning?
item.description: New data shows no increased cardiovascular risk of the osteoporosis drug vs anabolic agents — and even suggests a lower risk. Medscape Medical News

item.title: FDA Warns Companies Hawking ‘Legal Morphine’ Products
